Uses of Interface
org.eclipse.gef.requests.CreationFactory

  • Packages that use CreationFactory 
    Package Description
    org.eclipse.gef.dnd  
    org.eclipse.gef.palette
    This package defines and implements the model used by the PaletteViewer.
    org.eclipse.gef.requests
    This package contains the common Request types used by the provided tools and edit policies.
    org.eclipse.gef.tools
    This package provides several tool implementations.
    org.eclipse.gef.ui.actions
    This package support for using JFace Actions in your EditorPart.

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected CreationFactory CreationToolEntry.factory
      Deprecated. 
      in 3.1. This field will be removed in future releases. The factory is being provided to the tool via the ToolEntry.setToolProperty(Object, Object) method.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleFactory
      A simple CreationFactory that takes a Class in the constructor and creates a new instance of this Class in SimpleFactory.getNewObject().
